data.name: Mysterious insects
data.detailed_description:
Gloria Horn, a middle-aged woman who never left the tiny town of Mildred, a world away from the outside world with the many kilometers of woods where she was born and grew up, due to a sudden hearing loss, is forced to go to New York, the largest metropolis in America.

It will have to overcome its internal complexes and face a hostile external world. And whether she can do it - depends only on you.

In the game «Mysterious insects» you will find:

    1) Several different endings of varying degrees of cruelty;[/ list]
      2) Excellent (in the author's opinion) plot;[/ list]
        3) The atmosphere of the back streets of New York;[/ list]
          4) Psychological experiences of the main character;[/ list]
            5) The need to make decisions depending on the circumstances;[/ list]
              6) A lot of movie quotes (from Michelangelo Antonioni to Quentin Tarantino).[/ list]

data.short_description: Gloria Horn, a middle-aged woman who never left the town where she was born and grew up, due to a sudden hearing loss, is forced to go to an operation in New York - America's largest megalopolis.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 and higher
  • Processor: Intel Pentium and higher
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
